formattrs.name: form-item
formattrs.desc: For details about the FormItem component under Form, see the tiny.Widget.Form.FormItem attribute configuration of FormItem

formattrs.name: inline
formattrs.desc: In-line layout mode. The default value is false.
formattrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

formattrs.name: label-position
formattrs.desc: Layout position of the label in the form; The optional values of this attribute are right / left / top
formattrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is right.

formattrs.name: label-width
formattrs.desc: Label placeholder width in the form. The default value is 80px.
formattrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 80px.

formattrs.name: label-align
formattrs.desc: Check whether the text is aligned when the red asterisk next to the label of mandatory fields is displayed in the form.
formattrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

formattrs.name: hide-required-asterisk
formattrs.desc: Whether to display the red asterisk next to the label of mandatory fields
formattrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

formattrs.name: show-message
formattrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

formattrs.name: inline-message
formattrs.desc: Display validation information in line format
formattrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

formattrs.name: validate-on-rule-change
formattrs.desc: Whether to trigger a verification immediately after the rules attribute is changed
formattrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

formattrs.name: size
formattrs.desc: Controls the size of components in the form. The optional values of this attribute are medium / small / mini
formattrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is null.

formattrs.name: disabled
formattrs.desc: Whether to disable all components in the form. If this parameter is set to true, the disabled attribute of components in the form does not take effect.
formattrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

formattrs.name: novalid-tip
formattrs.desc: Whether to display the tip in the verification dialog box

formattrs.name: validate-position
formattrs.desc: Specify the position where the verification dialog box is displayed. The value of this attribute can be top-start / top / top-end / left-start / left / left-end / right-start / right / right-end / bottom-start / bottom / bottom-end
formattrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is right.

formattrs.name: validate-type
formattrs.desc: Verification type; The optional values of this attribute are tip / text
formattrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is tip.

formmethods.name: validate
formmethods.desc: Method for verifying the entire form. The parameter is a callback function. The callback function will be invoked after the verification is complete and two parameters are transferred: whether the verification is successful and whether the verification fails. If the callback function is not transferred, a promise is returned.

formmethods.name: validateField
formmethods.desc: Method for verifying some fields in a form

formmethods.name: resetFields
formmethods.desc: Reset all field values to the initial values and remove the verification result.

formmethods.name: clearValidate
formmethods.desc: The verification result of removing a form item is transferred to the prop attribute of the form item to be removed or an array consisting of prop. If this parameter is not transferred, the verification result of the entire form is removed.

formevents.name: validate
formevents.desc: Triggered after any form item is verified

formItemattrs.name: prop
formItemattrs.desc: Form field model. This attribute is mandatory when the validate and resetFields methods are used. The optional value of this attribute is -
formItemattrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is the field in the model of the Form component.

formItemattrs.name: label
formItemattrs.desc: Label text; The optional value of this attribute is -
formItemattrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is -

formItemattrs.name: label-width
formItemattrs.desc: Width of the form field label, for example, '50px'. Auto is supported. The optional value of this attribute is -
formItemattrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is -

formItemattrs.name: required
formItemattrs.desc: Indicates whether this parameter is mandatory. If this parameter is not set, the parameter is automatically generated based on the verification rule. The optional value of this attribute is -
formItemattrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

formItemattrs.name: rules
formItemattrs.desc: Form validation rule; The optional value of this attribute is -
formItemattrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is -.

formItemattrs.name: error
formItemattrs.desc: Form field verification error. If this parameter is set, the form verification status changes to error and the error information is displayed. The optional value of this attribute is -
formItemattrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is -.

formItemattrs.name: show-message
formItemattrs.desc: Whether to display verification error information; The optional value of this attribute is -
formItemattrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

formItemattrs.name: inline-message
formItemattrs.desc: The validation information is displayed in rows. The optional value of this attribute is -
formItemattrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

formItemattrs.name: size
formItemattrs.desc: Controls the size of the component in the form field. The optional values of this attribute are medium / small / mini
formItemattrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is null.

formItemattrs.name: validate-position
formItemattrs.desc: Specify the position where the verification dialog box is displayed. The value of this attribute can be top-start / top / top-end / left-start / left / left-end / right-start / right / right-end / bottom-start / bottom / bottom-end
formItemattrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is top-end.

formItemattrs.name: validate-type
formItemattrs.desc: Verification type; The optional values of this attribute are tip / text
formItemattrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is tip.

formItemmethods.name: resetField
formItemmethods.desc: Reset the table item to the initial value and remove the verification result.

formItemmethods.name: clearValidate
formItemmethods.desc: Remove the verification result of the table item.

formItemevents.name: validate
formItemevents.desc: This event is triggered after any form item is verified.
